Txt_Talk_Tedon_Out_MAIN_0_ACTOR_0110_010.Text: But there is something scrawled on the wall...
<6>I had hoped to bequeath my precious orb to a worthy custodian while I yet lived...<9>
<6>Praise be! I may die now, happy in the knowledge that I was able to bequeath my orb while I yet lived...<9>

Txt_Talk_Tedon_Out_MAIN_0_VOLUME_0120_01.Text: *: Oh! Thou art come at last!
*: I had foreseen that one day, a great hero, on a quest most noble, would visit me!
This is our den of darkness...
And we will not suffer the living here!
*: Gather thee the orbs scattered 'cross the world, and take thee said orbs to the sacred place in Rimland<--->an isle of ice far to the south!
*: There shall a new path open unto thee!

Txt_Talk_Tedon_Out_MAIN_0_ACTOR_0120_010.Text: *: Gather thee the orbs scattered 'cross the world, and take thee said orbs to the sacred place in Rimland<--->an isle of ice far to the south!

Txt_Talk_Tedon_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0320_010_.Text: *: Greetings to thee, stranger, and welcome to the merry village of Theddon!

Txt_Talk_Tedon_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0420_010_.Text: *: The Archfiend Baramos maketh his lair in the depths of the mountainous Necrogond to the north-east.
*: Sometimes, it seemeth that the tendrils of his malice seek us out, close by his realm as we are...

Txt_Talk_Tedon_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0520_010_.Text: *: Sail thee east 'round the Cape of Theddon, and follow thee thereafter the coast. When thou hast sailed some way to the north, thou shalt come upon a river which windeth unto the foot of a volcano.
*: This great mountain of fire formeth the doorway to the Necrogond.
*: Yet approach it not if thou harbourest the faintest doubt as to thine own readiness. 'Tis a place where only the strong may survive...

Txt_Talk_Tedon_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0620_010_.Text: *: This is the village jail. Begone, trespasser!

Txt_Talk_Tedon_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0720_010_.Text: *: Though the Archfiend himself may strike, we will protect our dear village with our very lives!
*: Beg pardon? ...Was not our village already laid waste by his dread hand? Uh...did I hear thee aright, friend?
*: But thy question defieth all reason! Were it so, I should not be conversing with thee, foolish child<--->nor any other living soul!
*: Nay, I thought not. Why, to ask if the fair hamlet thou seest here had suffered such a fate would bespeak madness...

Txt_Talk_Tedon_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0820_010_.Text: *: Listen well, wanderer. If thou wouldst open the door of yonder jail, thou must needs obtain the ultimate key.
*: To find it, hie thee to Lanson, in the land far to the south-east of Baharata...

Txt_Talk_Tedon_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0920_010_.Text: *: Oh, to soar through the skies!
*: Free from the ravages of foul fiends, able to go wherever one pleased...

Txt_Talk_Tedon_Out_Ground_1_1.Text: Why don't you go and show the bard in Cloudsgate Citadel what you just got?

Txt_Talk_Tedon_Room_B1F_SearchObj_Coffin.Text: {LEADER} peers apprehensively through a crack in the sarcophagus...
Is it dead...? Is it alive...? It's... It's...just a corpse.

Txt_Talk_Tedon_Out_SUB_0_VOLUME_1310_010.Text: {LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...
Hee hee hee! That's a good one!

Txt_Talk_Tedon_Room_B1F_SUB_0_VOLUME_021.Text: {LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...
